meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the January 8, 2025 City Council Meeting
Authorize a one-year extension for Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Funds
agenda_items.description: Authorize a one-year extension for CDBG funded projects that have not met the Cityâ€™s twelve-month obligation or twenty-four-month expenditure requirement.

agenda_items.title: Authorize acceptance of a grant from the U.S. Department of Justice
agenda_items.description: Authorize acceptance of a grant for the FY 2024 Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of bodily injury claims
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of claims brought by Kristian McCullough in the lawsuit against the City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of lawsuit
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled, Evelyn McKeller v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.description: Authorize additional legal services regarding Triple D Trademark District Court Litigation.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions
